detail_desc: Glittery shoulder bag with a metal decoration on the front, flap with a hook and loop fastening, and shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size 4x9x13.5 cm.

Playsuit in a soft viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a cut-out section at the back with a sewn-on bow at the top. Wide, elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and wide legs.
Cardigan in soft, rib-knit cotton with a V-neck, long sleeves and wrapover front with a tie belt at the waist.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Fitted, padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim, zip down the front, zipped front pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Biker jacket in imitation leather with quilted shoulders, a small stand-up collar with a tab and press-stud, and a diagonal zip at the front. Zipped side pockets and long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Straight-cut, calf-length dress in a fine-knit cotton blend with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and a ribbed hem with slits in the sides. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft jersey with an interactive motif on the front.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, long legs and press-stud fastenings.
Hi-top canvas trainers with a lightly padded shaft, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Cardigan in a soft, inside-out jacquard knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Swimsuit with a glittery pattern, narrow shoulder straps and a frill at the front. Lined at the front.
Jacket in soft fleece with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, long raglan sleeves and taped trims at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Trousers in an airy weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a motif on the front.

All-in-one suit in soft pile. Hood with ears and a zip down the front that has a chin guard at the top and continues down one leg. Opening mitts at the cuffs that can be folded over to keep the hands warm. Jersey lining.
Short, fitted dress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a short slit at the front of the hem. Unlined.
Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and an open back pocket.
Tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Short cardigan knitted in soft bouclé yarn with a V-neck, long sleeves and a wrapover front with ties at the hem.

Super push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Patterned beach hat with ties under the chin. Width of brim 6 cm.
Small shoulder bag in imitation leather with satin details, a flap with a metal snap lock, and metal chain shoulder strap. One small inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 5x13.5x18.5 cm.
Waist-high briefs in lace with a V-shaped waist, and cut-out section at the back with wide satin ribbon ties. Lined gusset and a high cut at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, ties at the sides and a high cut at the back.
Treggings in superstretch twill with a regular, elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
5-pocket slim-fit trousers in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, and decorative stitching on the legs.
Sports trousers in fast-drying fabric made from recycled polyester with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs. Regular fit.
Shorts in a sturdy cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastener.
Shoulder bag in imitation patent leather with a semi-transparent handle, a wide, detachable shoulder strap and a zip at the top. Lined. Size approx. 7x13x20 cm.
All-in-one suit in a fine, marled knit with thermal fleece inside, a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and raglan sleeves.

Cropped jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, welt side pockets, and tabs with press-studs at the sides. Relaxed fit. The jacket is made partly from recycled cotton.
Trousers in a patterned crêpe weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and long, wide legs.
Wide, elastic waist belt with imitation leather details and a metal fastener. Width 6.5 cm.
Triangle bikini top with removable inserts and narrow shoulder straps that link together into a racer back and tie at the back.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Ankle-high sandals with open toes, open heels, a zip in one side and covered block heels. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Platform 1.5 cm, heel 11 cm.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey.
Jacket in washed stretch denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and buttoned cuffs.
Wide trousers in a soft weave with a high waist, detachable tie belt, concealed zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening and side pockets.
Narrow, elastic hairband with a metal clip at the back.

Trousers in sturdy, heavily draping jersey with a concealed zip in one side. Straight legs with pearly beads down the sides and concealed press-studs which allow them to be opened from the thighs down.
Jumper in a textured knit in soft chenille yarn with dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and an open back pocket. Legs with seams at the knees and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim with a high comfort factor. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8x-12xY), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Long padded jacket with a padded hood, shawl collar and concealed press-studs down the front. Dropped shoulders and welt side pockets. Lined.
5-pocket trousers in washed stretch twill with a regular waist and zip fly. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Henley top in slub cotton jersey with a button placket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slim legs.
Leather shoulder bag with a large metal fastener on the flap, metal chain shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size7x23x26.5 cm.

Fitted blouse in a crêpe weave with elastication over the shoulders and a sweetheart neckline with gathers at the bust. Smocking at the back and long puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Hoop earrings in metal and plastic. Three pairs in a solid colour and one patterned pair. Diameter 1.7 cm.
MRS MIGHETTO x H&M/BABY EXCLUSIVE. Double-layered hat in printed, stretch cotton jersey.

Advent calendar with 24 windows, each containing a small gift, such as a hair elastic, ring or pair of hair clips. Size 2x25x25 cm. This advent calendar is not for children under three as it contains small parts.
Small, two-section bag in grained imitation leather with zips and a magnetic fastener at the top and a narrow shoulder strap with a chain fastening. Lined. Size 4.5x9x17 cm.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and buttons, and skinny legs with visible seams at the front.
Top in airy jersey crêpe with a V-neck, short cap sleeves and a small stand-up collar with gathers at the back of the neck.
Wide top in soft, printed jersey with short, wide dolman sleeves and a rounded hem.
Ankle-length trousers in soft, airy viscose twill with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, patch front pockets and elasticated hems.
Double-layered hat in striped cotton jersey.
Oversized jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Fabric belts with adjustable metal buckles. Width 4 cm.
Bikini top with laser-cut edges and lined, lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook and eye fastener at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequined motif on the front, a round, ribbed neckline, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
High-waisted trousers in a crêpe weave with contrasting colour seams, a zip fly, side pockets, fake back pockets and wide, flared legs with creases.
Blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck, short dolman sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a gently rounded hem. Wide fit with a gentle drape to the hem.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a print motif. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Tights in a textured knit with an elasticated waist.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Handbag in imitation leather with a zip and two adjustable handles at the top.Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Size 14x27x32 cm.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a hood and zip down the front. Side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Set of two pairs of socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. One pair in an adult size (6.5-10.5) and one pair in a child size.
Handbag accessory in the shape of a tied scarf in a patterned weave with a metal keyring and carabiner hook. Length approx. 34 cm.
